triples.name: Distributed control system
triples.relevance: Core concept for the survey on distributed coordination control systems in networked environments.

triples.name: Networked control system
triples.relevance: Fundamental framework where control loops are closed through communication networks with event-triggered scheduling.

triples.name: Multi-agent system
triples.relevance: Underlying paradigm for coordinating multiple interacting distributed agents in the control systems discussed.

triples.name: Consensus dynamics
triples.relevance: Mathematical framework for achieving agreement among distributed agents through local interactions and information exchange.

triples.name: Smart grid
triples.relevance: Key application domain for dynamic event-triggered distributed coordination control in modern power systems.

triples.name: Microgrid
triples.relevance: Specific application example of dynamic event-triggered control discussed in the survey for distributed energy management.

triples.name: Intelligent transportation system
triples.relevance: Major application domain for distributed coordination control enabling coordinated traffic and vehicle management.

triples.name: Self-driving car
triples.relevance: Specific application example in automated vehicles requiring distributed coordination control techniques.

triples.name: Distributed algorithm
triples.relevance: Algorithmic techniques underlying the coordination control strategies reviewed in the survey.
